mapper.select: SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'MAIN' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT r.RESERVATION_ID AS reservationId, r.RESERVATION_NAME AS reservationName, d.DINING_NAME AS diningName, r.RESERVATION_DATE AS reservationDate, r.RESERVATION_STATUS AS reservationStatus, r.RESERVATION_TYPE AS reservationType FROM DINING_RESERVATION r LEFT JOIN DINING d ON r.DINING_ID = d.DINING_ID ORDER BY r.RESERVATION_DATE DESC, r.RESERVATION_TIME DESC
SELECT DINING_ID, DINING_NAME, TYPE, PHONE_NUMBER, LOCATION, DINING_INTRODUCTION, DINING_CLASSIFICATION FROM DINING WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningID}
SELECT DINING_ID, DINING_NAME, TYPE, LOCATION, DINING_RESV_AVAILABILITY FROM DINING WHERE DINING_RESV_AVAILABILITY = 'Y' ORDER BY DINING_ID

SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, R.RESERVATION_NAME, R.RESERVATION_TELL, R.RESERVATION_DATE, R.RESERVATION_TIME, R.RESERVATION_COUNT, R.RESERVATION_STATUS, R.RESERVATION_REQUEST, R.RESERVATION_TYPE, R.DINING_ID, D.DINING_NAME FROM DINING_RESERVATION R JOIN DINING D ON R.DINING_ID = D.DINING_ID WHERE R.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DINING_RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_ID, DINING_ID, USER_NUM, PAYMENT_ID, NON_MEM_ID, RESERVATION_TYPE, RESERVATION_NAME, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_TIME, RESERVATION_COUNT, RESERVATION_REQUEST, RESERVATION_TELL, RESERVATION_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{reservationId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diningId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nonMemId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reservationType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{reservationTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reservationCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reservationRequest, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationTell, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE DINING_RESERVATION SET RESERVATION_DATE = #{reservationDate}, RESERVATION_TIME = #{reservationTime}, RESERVATION_COUNT = #{reservationCount}, RESERVATION_STATUS = #{reservationStatus}, RESERVATION_REQUEST = #{reservationRequest} WHERE RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId}
